prompt: Close-up, photorealistic macro shot of a painter's signature etched into thick, textured oil paint on a canvas. The signature is partially obscured by cracks and age, with soft, diffused light highlighting the subtle details of the brushstrokes and the aged texture of the paint. Focus is critically sharp on the signature itself, with a shallow depth of field blurring the surrounding canvas. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-identify-artist-signature-image-1.png

prompt: A brightly lit, professional art conservation studio. A conservator wearing magnifying glasses carefully examines a painting on an easel, using a small brush to clean the area around a faded signature. The background is filled with shelves containing various art conservation tools and chemicals. The composition is balanced, with the conservator and the painting positioned slightly off-center to create visual interest. The lighting is even and highlights the details of the restoration process. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-identify-artist-signature-image-2.png

prompt: A dimly lit antique shop interior. The camera focuses on a stack of old paintings leaning against a wall. One painting in the foreground is partially visible, revealing a barely legible signature in the bottom corner. Dust motes float in the air, illuminated by a single shaft of light filtering through a nearby window. The scene is atmospheric and evokes a sense of mystery and discovery. Use a shallow depth of field to draw attention to the signature. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-identify-artist-signature-image-3.png

prompt: Split-screen comparison: On the left, a high-resolution image of an artist's signature taken from a painting. On the right, a digital mock-up of various fonts being overlaid on the signature to attempt to identify it. A computer screen in the background displays art authentication software. The lighting is bright and even, emphasizing the clarity and detail of both images. The composition is clean and modern, conveying a sense of technological precision. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-identify-artist-signature-image-4.png

prompt: A cluttered artist's studio, filled with canvases, paint tubes, brushes, and other art supplies. In the center of the frame, a sketchbook lies open, displaying various signature experiments and sketches. The lighting is natural and warm, filtering through a large window. The scene is messy but inviting, capturing the creative atmosphere of an artist's workspace. The focus is on the sketchbook, with the surrounding studio elements providing context. --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
name: how-to-identify-artist-signature-image-5.png
